t: For the choir director. A Maskil of David. When Doeg the Edomite went and reported to Saul, telling him, “David went to Ahimelech’s house.”
Why*pn boast about evil, you hero! God’s*ln faithful love is constant.
Like*ln a sharpened razor, your*ln tongue devises destruction, working*ln treachery.
You*ln love evil instead of good, lying*ln instead of speaking truthfully. Selah*ig
You*ln love any words that destroy, you*ln treacherous tongue!
This*pn is why God will bring you down forever. He*ln will take you, ripping you out of your tent; he*ln will uproot you from the land of the living. Selah*ig
The*ln righteous will see and fear, and*ln they will derisively say about that hero,
“Here*ln is the man who*ln would not make God his refuge, but*ln trusted in the abundance of his riches, taking*ln refuge in his destructive behavior.”
But*pn I am like a flourishing olive tree in*ln the house of God; I*ln trust in God’s faithful love forever and ever.
I*ln will praise you forever for what you have done. In*ln the presence of your faithful people, I*ln will put my hope in your name, for it is good.
